attributes.review: I wanted news from my president! But the app keeps crashing my phone and failing. Any time I try to sign in the screen goes black. Horrible!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because someone told me it was our “presidents” app and that it was his plans for 2020. But I think someone coded it to look like Hitler.. I mean either that... or maybe he is like Hitler?

attributes.review: This app is horrible it took forever to download and it made my phone glitch! Not to mention he’s a raciest so not really sure why he gets an app.

attributes.review: It keeps on crashing AND IT DOESNT LOAD ANYTHING I had to delete and download it multiple times to see if it would work properly😔 but it didn’t so one start if it was up to me I’d give it zero🥰🥰🥰

attributes.review: Wow❤️🤍💙as soon as I opened the app I instantly threw up my oatmeal 😞😞 guess I’m gonna have to fight corruption on an empty stomach thanks to president Daniel Trunk or whatever his name is.
